description.title: Color
description.text: In the text, VIEW shows you the Russian nouns in orange.

description.title: Click
description.text: Click on each Russian noun you find in the text and VIEW will show you whether you guessed right or wrong.

description.title: Multiple Choice
description.text: Choose a Russian noun from the drop-down list and VIEW will show you whether you guessed right or wrong. You can get help by clicking on ?.

description.title: Fill in the blanks
description.text: Fill in the blanks with the correct Russian noun. If you guessed wrong or you find it too difficult you can get help by clicking on ?.
